literal_meaning: To throw a stone into the swamp.
example: His comments were like throwing a stone into the swamp; they stirred up trouble.
The twins look like две капки вода.

figurative_meaning: Something that doesn’t exist or is not possible.
example: You can’t expect that; няма такова нещо.
When I saw his performance, падна ми шапката.

literal_meaning: To be on the seventh sky.
example: She was на седмото небе after receiving the good news.

idiom: Да не се бърка в чужди работи
literal_meaning: Not to meddle in others' affairs.
example: You should focus on your own tasks; да не се бърка в чужди работи.

idiom: Когато котката я няма, мишките танцуват
literal_meaning: When the cat's away, the mice will play.
figurative_meaning: People will take advantage of someone’s absence.
example: They were misbehaving when the teacher left; когато котката я няма, мишките танцуват.
No matter the problem, there’s always a way; на всяка манджа мерудия.

literal_meaning: To throw oneself into the deep.
example: He decided to start his own business; да се хвърли в дълбокото.
I ran into my old friend in a different country; светът е малък.
